00015 class Plugins_Flickr_Publish extends Common_Publish
00016 {
00017     protected $_account;
00018     protected $_client;
00019

00021      * @return void
00022      */

00024     {
00025         parent::__construct();

00028     /**
00029      * Método para conectarse a una identidad flickr
00030      * @param User_Accounts_Data $token
00031      * @return void
00032      *
00033      * (non-PHPdoc)
00034      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#connect($token)
00035      */
00036     public function connect($token)
00037     {
00038         if (! $token instanceof User_Accounts_Data) {
00039 
00040             throw new Exception("Invalid data");
00041         }
00042 
00043         $this->_account = $token;
00044         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00045         $auth = unserialize($this->_account->getAuth());
00046 
00047         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00048         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('flickr', 'apikeys');
00049 
00050         $this->_ci->load->library("phpFlickr");
00051         $this->_ci->phpflickr->initialize($this->_config);
00052 
00053         $this->_client = $this->_ci->phpflickr;
00054 
00055         $credentials = unserialize($this->_account->getAuth());
00056         $this->_client->setToken($credentials["token"]);
00057     }
00058     
00059     /**
00060      * Método que valida si el contenido a publicar es correcto.
00061      *
00062      * @param array $post
00063      * @param User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount
00064      * @return Message_Data
00065      *
00066      * (non-PHPdoc)
00067      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#validatePost($post, $targetAccount)
00068      */
00069     public function validatePost($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount)
00070     {
00071         $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00072 
00073         $msg = new Message_Data();
00074 
00075         if (is_null($post)) {
00076 
00077             $msg->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError"));
00078         }
00079 
00080         if (isset($post["flickr_title"]) and $post["flickr_title"] != "") {
00081 
00082             $msg->setTitle($post["flickr_title"]);
00083 
00084         } else {
00085 
00086             $msg->setError("flickr_title", $this->_ci->lang->line("requiredField"));
00087         }
00088 
00089         return $msg;
00090     }
00091 
00092     /**
00093      * Método para publicar contenido en cuentas flickr
00094      * @param array $post
00095      * @param User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount
00096      * @return Message_Data
00097      *
00098      * (non-PHPdoc)
00099      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#publish($post, $targetAccount)
00100      */
00101     public function publish($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount, $files = null)
00102     {
00103         $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00104          $this->_account = $targetAccount;
00105 
00106         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00107         $msg = $this->validatePost($post, $targetAccount, $files);
00108 
00109         if (!is_array($files) or count($files) == 0) {
00110 
00111             $msg->setError("flickr_img", $this->_ci->lang->line("noImage"));
00112         }
00113 
00114         $msg->setIdU($auth->getUserId());
00115         $msg->setOwner("1");
00116 
00117         if ($msg->isValid()) {
00118 
00119             $account = $auth->getEnabledAccount($post["publishIn"]);
00120 
00121             $this->connect($account);
00122 
00123             $newPath = FCPATH."tmp/".$auth->getUserId().$files["flickr_img"]["name"];
00124             if (! move_uploaded_file($files["flickr_img"]["tmp_name"], $newPath)) {
00125 
00126                 $msg->setError("form", sprintf($this->_ci->lang->line("couldNotWriteIn"), FCPATH));
00127                 return $msg;
00128             }
00129 
00130             $files["flickr_img"]["tmp_name"] = $newPath;
00131 
00132             $photo = $files["flickr_img"]["tmp_name"];
00133             $title = $post["flickr_title"] == "" ? null : $post["flickr_title"];
00134             $description = $post["flickr_description"] == "" ? null : $post["flickr_description"];
00135             $tags = $post["flickr_description"] == "" ? null : $post["flickr_description"];
00136             $isPublic = null;
00137             $isFriend = null;
00138             $isFamily = null;
00139 
00140             if(isset($post["flickr_private"]) and $post["flickr_private"] == 1) {
00141 
00142                 $isPublic = 0;
00143 
00144                 if (isset($post["flickr_friends"]) and $post["flickr_friends"] == 1) {
00145 
00146                     $isFriend = 1;
00147 
00148                 } else {
00149 
00150                     $isFriend = 0;
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 if (isset($post["flickr_relatives"]) and $post["flickr_relatives"] == 1) {
00154 
00155                     $isFamily = 1;
00156 
00157                 } else {
00158 
00159                     $isFamily = 0;
00160                 }
00161 
00162             } else {
00163             
00164                 $isPublic = 1;
00165             }
00166 
00167             try {
00168 
00169                 $response = $this->_client->sync_upload($photo, $title, $description, $tags, $isPublic, $isFriend, $isFamily);
00170 
00171                 if(is_numeric($response)) {
00172 
00173                     $msg = $this->fetch($response);
00174 
00175                 } else {
00176 
00177                     $msg->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError"));
00178                 }
00179                 
00180             } catch(Exception $e) {
00181             
00182                 $msg->setError("form", $e->getMessage());
00183             }
00184         }
00185 
00186         if (isset($newPath) and file_exists($newPath)) {
00187 
00188             unlink($newPath);
00189         }
00190 
00191         return $msg;
00192     }
00193 
00194     /**
00195      * @param integer $photoId
00196      * @return Message_Data
00197      */
00198     public function fetch($photoId)
00199     {
00200         $data = $this->_client->photos_getInfo ($photoId);
00201         $photo = $data["photo"];
00202 
00203         $uploadedImage = array(
00204             "id" => $photo["id"],
00205             "owner" => $photo["owner"]["nsid"],
00206             "ownername" => $photo["owner"]["username"],
00207             "secret" => $photo["secret"],
00208             "server" => $photo["server"],
00209             "farm" => $photo["farm"],
00210             "title" => $photo["title"],
00211             "activities" => array(array(
00212                 "photos_uploaded" => 1,
00213                 "type" => "app"
00214             )),
00215         );
00216 
00217         return Plugins_Flickr_DB::save(array($uploadedImage), $this->_account);
00218     }
00219

00223     public function reference (Message_Data $message, User_Accounts_Data $account)
00224     {
00225         return false;
